name: hinge-bio-generator
description: AI-powered Hinge bio generator using MERN Stack

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.setup: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && echo 'Setup complete! See SETUP.md for next steps'
